references.paper_title: From Play to Policy: Conditional Behavior Generation from Uncurated Robot Data
references.reason: This paper's approach to learning generalist policies from diverse, uncurated robot data is directly relevant to the current research, which seeks to improve generalization in robotics.
This work is highly relevant because it also utilizes discrete latent variable models to improve generalizability in robotics, which provides a strong baseline for comparison.
